item.title: Viral Short videos "Outside the Box" creator Radical Creative only - Upwork
item.description:
I am a "radical"  "outside the box" thinker/ philosopher of language.

I am about to go viral
I need a similarly provocative creative who wants to experiment using intuitive creativity or AI

Seeking to shock
With revolutionary and feather ruffling provocative theories

Ideas include Freudian (like) theories of the unconscious mind creating hiden phallic imagery  in words.

Also, I want to creatie short Viral videos about onomatopoeia words for world wide audience

(Definition of onomatopoeia from Wikipedia: Words that phonetically imitate resembles, or suggests the sound)
If possible please provide a link or sample of work that illustrates the kind of stuff that you can do as far as using graphics, animation, whiteboards, AI, or any other unique Elements and features that you are able to incorporate or have in the past


Posted On: June 16, 2024 17:01 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Humor, Comedy, Avant-Garde, Satire, Documentary, Drama, Thriller, Adventure, Science Fiction, Animation, Video Production, Photo Slideshow
Skills: Humor, Comedy, Avant-Garde, Satire, Documentary, Drama, Thriller, Adventure, Science Fiction, Animation, Video Production, Photo Slideshow

item.title: Video Editor for TikTok/Shorts/Reels - Upwork
item.description:
Our team at The Daily Ratings Podcast is looking for a short form video editor!

Currently we are looking to partner with an editor to add video and on-screen text in a finished product able to be posted to TikTok/YouTube Shorts/Instagram Reels.

We run a film podcast and are at 130+ episodes.
Thedailyratings.com
Find us on Spotify and Apple as well
https://linktr.ee/thedailyratings

The work flow we are suggesting is providing our episodes/streams. The first few batches we will be providing highlight clips from the episodes, but ideally the work flow becomes Us providing the entire episode, and you finding what clips work best.

Once in your hands we want to find relevant movie clips to edit together a visual, based on what we are discussing. Then in typical TikTok style, edit visual caption/text from the audio. Each episode we cover multiple movies, so will be looking to have 3-5 videos per episode.

The plan is to have the same single short video posted to the 3 platforms listed above. We are aiming to post a minimum of 2-4 videos a week, but are looking to partner with an editor to possibly grow that frequency.  We also would love to see any new content ideas, beyond chopping up our episodes, possibly for any trends we can quickly act on.

Lastly, see below for some sample edits that have done well on our Socials. These are the examples we would like to have a baseline, but of course open to different styles and input.

https://www.instagram.com/reel/C6RWcjsppVN/?utm_source=ig_web_copy_link&igsh=MzRlODBiNWFlZA==

https://www.instagram.com/reel/C7EvH3RpNGc/?utm_source=ig_web_copy_link&igsh=MzRlODBiNWFlZA==

https://www.instagram.com/reel/CuHgI5ZsEB2/?utm_source=ig_web_copy_link&igsh=MzRlODBiNWFlZA==

https://www.instagram.com/reel/CuZ7xnkAT3A/?utm_source=ig_web_copy_link&igsh=MzRlODBiNWFlZA==

We look forward to speaking with you all!


Hourly Range: $15.00-$20.00
Posted On: June 16, 2024 17:01 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Dialogue Editing, Video Annotation, Social Video Enhancement, CapCut, Final Cut Pro, DaVinci Resolve, Adobe Creative Cloud, Microsoft Windows Movie Maker, Sony Vegas, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production
Skills: Dialogue Editing, Video Annotation, Social Video Enhancement, CapCut, Final Cut Pro, DaVinci Resolve, Adobe Creative Cloud, Microsoft Windows Movie Maker, Sony Vegas, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Editing After Effects templates. Short videos for social media. - Upwork
item.description:
Hi! We need a specialist who can help with editing After Effects templates.

We are a design agency specializing in mobile app design. We need a specialist to help create short promo videos to showcase our cases on social media: Instagram Reels, TikTok, YouTube Shorts. In the future, we will need 3-5 videos per month on an ongoing basis.

- We provide After Effects templates. They are horizontal and need to be adapted to a vertical format. Replace the screenshots with ours and insert our logo at the end of the video.
- 10 short clips of 40-60 seconds each. Different template for each video. Use free music that Instagram will accept. Avoid overused tracks; try to find something interesting.
- $15 per video, $150 in total for 10 short videos.
- High quality is required

Budget: $150
Posted On: June 16, 2024 16:59 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Promotional Video, Adobe After Effects, Video Editing, Video Production, Motion Graphics
Skills: Promotional Video, Adobe After Effects, Video Editing, Video Production, Motion Graphics
Country: Ukraine
click to apply

I am running 5+ YouTube Faceless channels and I am loooking for a moderately advanced Video Editor for my new Faceless channel about News and Politics.

It requires clip searching and implementing everything according to the story/plot, so it keeps the viewers engaged.

We are planning to produce 1-2 videos a day (8-12 minutes).

item.title: Video Editor for Punjabi Interview Footage - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video editor who can work with approximately 2 hours of interview footage in Punjabi language. The footage is in 4K resolution and there is an additional 30 minutes of footage in 720P resolution. The 2 hour interview was taken with two different cameras, one showing a wider view with both the interviewer and the interviewee, while one camera is focused on the interviewee. The video editor will be responsible for editing the footage to create a final polished video of approximately the same length as the original. Therefore, most of the work is bringing different angles and synching the audio.  The most challenging part is incorporating the lower resolution footage.  The editor should have experience in working with Punjabi language content and be able to handle high-quality footage. Attention to detail and the ability to work efficiently are essential. The ideal candidate should also have a creative eye and be able to make artistic decisions when it comes to editing.

The raw footage is available here: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/12BFqkw1t54eOI34LZjbxc8tDluohrowL?usp=sharing

The deliverable will be:
1. Final video in 4K
2. Final Cut Pro source file (is a big plus but not required)

Budget: $250
Posted On: June 16, 2024 16:48 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Final Cut Pro, Video Editing, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: Final Cut Pro, Video Editing, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor for Music Video Edits - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video editor to create short music video edits with great effects. The ideal candidate will have a strong sense of timing, creativity, and the ability to bring a musical vision to life through visual storytelling. The main responsibilities will include selecting and trimming footage, adding transitions and effects, and syncing video with audio tracks. The successful candidate should have experience with professional video editing software and be familiar with current trends in music video production. Attention to detail, a strong aesthetic sense, and the ability to work within tight deadlines are essential.

Duration- 25-30 sec
Budget- $5 per video

Budget: $5
Posted On: June 16, 2024 16:46 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Music Video
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Music Video
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: Need Someone To Find Original Clips From Edited Videos - Upwork
item.description:
Hello,

I am looking for someone to find original clips from edited videos etc... Very simple and easy job.

Here is an Example:
1. View Example Link (edited video) https://www.instagram.com/reel/C7CzS0lICDe/?igsh=MmNpNDU5anJ1OHNj
2. Find original clip of this video with no captions, watermark etc...
3. Upload the clip to my Google Drive OR send me the original clip video link

This will all be kept track of in spreadsheet.


Hourly Range: $3.00-$6.00
Posted On: June 16, 2024 16:46 UTC
Category: Data Extraction
Skills:Data Extraction, Data Scraping
Skills: Data Extraction, Data Scraping
